alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 7:38PM PST until December 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 2500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches mainly along the Cascade crest with lighter amounts along the east slopes. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Washington Cascades
